node.contents: Hi I'm new to Android Programming and I'm trying to make a simple program that changes the text by clicking a button. Here's my code:

astNode.text: Hi I'm new to Android Programming and I'm trying to make a simple program that changes the text by clicking a button. Here's my code:

elements.contents: public class HelloAndroidActivity extends Activity { /** Called when the activity is first created. */ @Override public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState); setContentView(R.layout.main); final Button button_scan = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button_scan); button_scan.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { public void onClick(View v) { buttonBeenPressed(); } }); } public void buttonBeenPressed(){ final Button button_scan = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button_scan); TextView tv_barcode = (TextView)findViewById(R.id.textview_barcode); if (tv_barcode != null){ tv_barcode.setText("been pressed."); } else { button_scan.setText("it's null dawg."); } } }

comments.text: /** Called when the activity is first created. */

units.rawText: public class HelloAndroidActivity extends Activity { /** Called when the activity is first created. */ @Override public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState); setContentView(R.layout.main); final Button button_scan = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button_scan); button_scan.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { public void onClick(View v) { buttonBeenPressed(); } }); } public void buttonBeenPressed(){ final Button button_scan = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button_scan); TextView tv_barcode = (TextView)findViewById(R.id.textview_barcode); if (tv_barcode != null){ tv_barcode.setText("been pressed."); } else { button_scan.setText("it's null dawg."); } } }

node.contents: However the TextView is returning NULL and i don't know why. Any suggestions? Thanks.

astNode.text: However the TextView is returning NULL and i don't know why. Any suggestions? Thanks.

node.contents: Your best bet to debug this may be to run your app on the emulator or a phone and run hierarchyviewer, find your TextView and check the id.

astNode.text: Your best bet to debug this may be to run your app on the emulator or a phone and run hierarchyviewer, find your TextView and check the id.

node.contents: That did the trick, silly Eclipse. Thanks.

astNode.text: That did the trick, silly Eclipse. Thanks.

node.contents: Hmmm i got no problems with your code, runs without any error! Are you working with eclipse? Then try to clean your project.
